subcategories.name: Robotic Hands
subcategories.what_is_covered: Rigid, multi-fingered end-effectors designed to replicate human hand dexterity.
subcategories.typical_examples: robotic hands; low-cost anthropomorphic hand design

subcategories.name: Soft & Continuum End-effectors
subcategories.what_is_covered: Deformable (soft grippers) or continuously bendable (continuum) manipulators that conform to objects.

subcategories.name: Mobile Manipulators
subcategories.what_is_covered: Dexterous arms mounted on mobile bases to enlarge workspace reach.

subcategories.name: Tactile Sensing
subcategories.what_is_covered: Measurement of contact forces/pressure for perceiving object interaction.

subcategories.name: Shape Sensing
subcategories.what_is_covered: Real-time estimation of manipulator shape, particularly for continuum robots.

subcategories.name: Haptic Feedback
subcategories.what_is_covered: Force/tactile cues returned to a human operator for enhanced perception.

subcategories.name: Reinforcement Learning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Trial-and-error policy learning methods, including techniques for higher sample efficiency.
subcategories.typical_examples: reinforcement learning; sample efficiency; diffusion policies

subcategories.name: Imitation & Demonstration Learning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Skill acquisition from human demonstrations or generated datasets.
subcategories.typical_examples: imitation learning; human-to-robot transfer; data generation

subcategories.name: Model-based Optimization
subcategories.what_is_covered: Planning/control via physics-based optimization of multi-contact motions.

subcategories.name: Multimodal / Vision-Language Policies
subcategories.what_is_covered: Policies that fuse visual, language and tactile inputs for manipulation.

subcategories.name: Learning-based Grasp & Control
subcategories.what_is_covered: Data-driven grasp planning and low-level control strategies.

subcategories.name: Sim-to-Real Transfer
subcategories.what_is_covered: Techniques to deploy simulation-trained policies on real robots.

subcategories.name: Teleoperation Systems
subcategories.what_is_covered: Remote manipulation where a human directly controls the robot, often with haptic feedback.

subcategories.name: Surgical Robotics
subcategories.what_is_covered: Use of dexterous, often continuum, manipulators for minimally invasive surgery.
